name: Dugrah
damage_resistances: Slashing, Piercing, and Bludgeoning from non-magical attacks that aren't silvered

special_traits.shapechanger: Dugrah can transform into a boar or hybrid form.
special_traits.devastating_charge: Moving 15 ft in a straight line, Dugrah can knock down the target with a melee attack.
special_traits.minion_command: Dugrah can summon up to 2 boars or 1d4 goblins.
special_traits.bloodthirsty_rage: Dugrah enters a rage when dropping below half HP (recharge 5-6).
special_traits.aura_of_fear: Enemies within 10 ft of Dugrah must make a Wisdom save DC 13 or be frightened.

actions.multiattack: Dugrah makes two attacks with his maul or tusks.
actions.maul: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Damage: 1d10+4 bludgeoning.
actions.tusks: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Damage: 2d6+4 piercing. Constitution save DC 12 for lycanthropy.
actions.brutal_charge: Dugrah charges 30 ft in a straight line, attacking all enemies in his path (recharge 5-6).

reactions.savage_retaliation: Dugrah can make a tusk attack when hit by a melee attack.

combat_tactics: Dugrah prefers brute force, knocking down enemies and summoning minions to overwhelm them.
